entry.source: My son {F804,5}Timothy{F804,0} has been missing since{F801}yesterday. He was pretending to be a Samurai{F801}and went out to play, but has not come back.{F801}He used to play in Kiccigiorgi Forest, but that{F801}place is now filled with demons... and I'm{F801}worried. I will wait at the {F804,5}city outskirts.{F804,0}{F801}
